docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia's attorney general said on Tuesday he would put a draft law before Congress next week easing the restrictions on abortion, marking a significant shift in opinion in the socially conservative country.

docs.lead_paragraph: The government quickly offered cash compensation for homes damaged by the explosions, but residents say that those unwilling to accept the settlements have been harassed.

headline.main: Months After Blasts in China, Rebuilding Tianjin Homes and Lives Is a Struggle
headline.print_headline: Months After the Explosions in Tianjin, a Struggle to Rebuild Lives and Homes

docs.abstract: Residents of condominium complex Vanke Port City in Tianjin, China, say they are grappling with task of rebuilding their lives three months after chemical explosions destroyed much of neighborhood; struggle continues even as government officials are intent on suppressing criticism in order to put embarrassing event in past.
docs.snippet: The government quickly offered cash compensation for homes damaged by the explosions, but residents say that those unwilling to accept the settlements have been harassed.
